entries.title: Architecture Decision: GitHub-Native IACP
entries.body: Chose GitHub Pages + GraphQL as primary stack for the Infinity Admin Control Plane. No external compute required for the dashboard layer. Self-hosted runners handle persistent tasks. GitHub Projects V2 is the state engine.

entries.title: IACP v1.0 Initial Deployment
entries.body: Dashboard v1.0 deployed to GitHub Pages via deploy-pages.yml workflow. Static HTML/CSS/JS with Monaco editor (CDN), dark/light mode, PWA manifest, and org repo index.

entries.title: PAT Strategy: Fine-Grained Tokens
entries.body: Use fine-grained PATs scoped to read:org, repo, read:project, security_events. Store GH_ORG_READ_TOKEN as org secret for Actions. Rotate every 90 days. Add rotation reminder to roadmap.

entries.title: GraphQL Indexing Performance
entries.body: 47 repos indexed in 2.3s via paginated GraphQL query (50 per page). Memory snapshot sync from infinity-core-memory: <500ms for <100 entries.

entries.title: PAT Token Expiry Risk
entries.body: Fine-grained PATs expire in 90 days. Validator status workflow checks token health every 4h. Alert via Actions failure if token is invalid. Manual rotation required â€” calendar reminder recommended.

entries.title: AI Runtime Integration Strategy
entries.body: Integrate Ollama (local), Groq (fast inference), Gemini (Google AI Studio), and Vertex AI (GCP: infinity-x-one-systems). Endpoints configured in Settings, stored in localStorage. Cloudflare tunnel (vizual-x.com) used for remote access. infinityxai.com hosts the Infinity Orchestrator GitHub App.
